channel.title: [C4D] Goblin
channel.description:
So I've been experimenting with some character modeling, and I randomly came up with this goblin head. Very quick job actually. I'm going to try and redo the entire thing and model up a whole body and more detailed head. Sorry for the artifacts around the eyes/nose. I undersampled the render cause I really need some time right now.
[img]http://i19.tinypic.com/47huuzc.jpg[/img]
